siteMetadata.title: Solar Sailer
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a developer, designer and product manager from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
I'm not saying offering things for free or pay-what-you-can is wrong. I'm saying my personal feeling is that my album's not a dime. It's not a buck. I made it as well as I could, and it costs 10 bucks, or go fuck yourself.

— Trent Reznor

(via ParisLemon)

excerptQuote.name: Trent Reznor
excerptQuote.quote: I'm not saying offering things for free or pay-what-you-can is wrong. I'm saying my personal feeling is that my album's not a dime. It's not a buck. I made it as well as I could, and it costs 10 bucks, or go fuck yourself.
